plot: This short experimental film is a visual conversion of Ernst Jandl's poem "chanson" from 1957, sort of a lyrical video clip.
title: Jandl Chanson
plot_es: This short experimental film is a visual conversion of Ernst Jandl's poem "chanson" from 1957, sort of a lyrical video clip.
plot_en: This short experimental film is a visual conversion of Ernst Jandl's poem "chanson" from 1957, sort of a lyrical video clip.
